channel.title: Wtf faggets lagging me!
channel.description:
Sorry for the language but this is really pissing me off -
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/2hf1h80.png[/img]
Some people/ or bots idk what or who it is keeps connecting to my server and it sais "Disconnection Null - ip address) This is jamming up my server, it causes others to take much longer to connect and lags me, im guessing because there trying to access my computer each time they log in. This has been going on since yesterday when it started, i checked the ip's/hostnames that are getting dced in my ipbans and bans but they are not there. If somebody could please tell me what these things are and how to stop them from connecting at all or let them connect so it will stop the fking jams.

@jig_saw wrote:

i wonder if the reaper x is the one who made reapage scape if it is its me link

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf faggets lagging me!
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

1st, when posting a topic, hit the caps lock button once more in the title.
2nd, don’t use wL, thats your best fix for crashes like that.
3rd, Hasmon, you obviously don’t know what your talking about when you say the reason it’s lagging is because of his computer. JVM lags and crashes, not the computer when you are using wL. The reason it lags, and eventually crashes, is because it creates a new thread for each connection, and it never fully disconnects the player (the socket is never closed). Also, it doesn’t matter if he gets disconnected or not. The player is never fully disconnected. The thread is still there (I believe) and so is the connection.

The reaper, one connection can be smart. But it’s no use in wL. There are to many more important things that need to be fixed first.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf faggets lagging me!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:7, topic:236177”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=311573.msg2484747#msg2484747 date=1223752895]

Their getting disconnected anyway so it won’t affect you.
[/quote]except the “lag” he talks about. The one connection per user should fix that though.

HELLO! They disconnected so yah it wont help with the 1ip since itll go like this.

Connect1
Processes Shit
Disconect1
Connect2
Processes Shit
Disconect2
Ect.

Also if he lags, he has a crappy computer then.[/quote]ctfo Either way, 1 connection is smart. You win hasu. >.>

Read full topic

item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“X Screech X, post:3, topic:236177”]Your second choice would be to get a screen shot of the IP and copy the IP letter by letter and paste it in Your server >> Data >> Banned IPs >>[/quote]That doesn’t work with bots.

item.title: Wtf faggets lagging me!
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Your best bet it to allow one connection per thread.
Your second choice would be to get a screen shot of the IP and copy the IP letter by letter and paste it in Your server >> Data >> Banned IPs >>

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf faggets lagging me!
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

they’re bots, they aren’t interested in accessing your computer, considering it’s not really possible through an account. They just crash your server by creating as many characters as possible to outrun the process your server can handle. I suggest looking for a tutorial on “making one account per ip” or something.

Read full topic
